resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

pitrou commented on pull request #12678:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12678#issuecomment-1075350965


   Can you take a look at the C/GLib CI failure here? https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/5645554934?check_suite_focus=true
   
   Also, usage in PyArrow should probably be migrated also, do you want to do it yourself? (otherwise, someone else can)
   https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/python/pyarrow/ipc.pxi#L609


--

pitrou commented on a change in pull request #12678:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12678#discussion_r832365226



##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/testing/gtest_util.h
##########
@@ -120,6 +120,11 @@
   ASSIGN_OR_HANDLE_ERROR_IMPL(           \
       ASSERT_OK, ARROW_ASSIGN_OR_RAISE_NAME(_error_or_value, __COUNTER__), lhs, rexpr);
 
+#define ASSERT_OK_NO_THROW_AND_ASSIGN(lhs, rexpr)                                       \
+  ASSIGN_OR_HANDLE_ERROR_IMPL(ASSERT_OK_NO_THROW,                                       \

Review comment:
       Does this have any point? If an exception is thrown, it will simply be caught and reported as an error by GTest.

##########
File path: cpp/src/arrow/record_batch_test.cc
##########
@@ -410,4 +410,32 @@ TEST_F(TestRecordBatchReader, BeginEndForLoop) {
   ASSERT_EQ(i, static_cast<int64_t>(batches_.size()));
 }
 
+ARROW_SUPPRESS_DEPRECATION_WARNING
+TEST_F(TestRecordBatchReader, DeprecatedReadAllToRecordBatches) {

Review comment:
       Should we also test the new (non-deprecated) methods?




--

ursabot edited a comment on pull request #12678:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12678#issuecomment-1077603095


   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 77111822d4c03eb37e89e032125811dd4fd640cc and contender = 623a15e7f7a45578733956714c8dddcc9f66f015. 623a15e7f7a45578733956714c8dddcc9f66f015 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/0412549ebdb34e9a8f9b864826dc16f4...7b2ce2bd143a4ad294d6e448a47b0cfb/)
   [Scheduled] [test-mac-arm](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/3a782f45efce41918f3f5c5940631bf3...fccd081403b04fa8b61a32d32b923967/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/9236868acdf5404d9dadb651debfe155...d4faf4637abe4cddbd54df437199552a/)

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Since we are changing Flight APIs to use Result<> (ARROW-15612), do the same to the ReadAll methods in RecordBatchReader for consistency
fields.summary: [C++] Change RecordBatchReader API to use Result<>
